short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily zoom on YouTube videos, with a simple scroll

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can easily zoom on YouTube videos. It can be useful to seek for something particular in a video, something you have some difficulties to see, or to resize the format of the theater mode.
